descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][center][b]Meet my version of Aela the Huntress! =D[/b]

[url=http://imgur.com/OjgqbSc][img]http://i.imgur.com/OjgqbSc.jpg[/img][/url][/center]


I tried to respect her original looks, so the warpaint is the same (except for the colour) and her hairstyle is not so different from her vanilla one.


[b][u]Required:[/u][/b] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] by Apachii


[b][u]Installation:[/u][/b]

- Download and extract the .BSA and .ESP files on your Skyrim/Data folder.
- Open the Skyrim launcher and check both on the Data Files option.
- Order the mods properly with a tool like [url=http://boss-developers.github.io/]BOSS[/url].
- Enjoy! =D


[b][u]Uninstallation:[/u][/b]

- Uncheck the mod from the Data Files option on the Skyrim launcher.
- Delete the mod files from the Skyrim/Data folder.
- Done! =D


[b][u]Incompatibilities/conflicts:[/u][/b] any mod that alters the appearance of Aela.


[b][u]Recommended (optional):[/u][/b]

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49963/?]True Eyes[/url] by JimtownIrish
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50307/?]True Brows[/url] by JimtownIrish
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27783/?]HN66s Long Eye Lashes[/url] by humannature66
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26113/?]Better Females By Bella Natural Edition[/url] by zzjay
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url] by Caliente or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url] by dimon99

If you use Better Females By Bella Natural Edition and have [b]neckseams[/b] on female characters, it's probably because you need either CBBE/UNP.


[b][u]Also used on the screenshots (but not required):[/u][/b]

- [url=http://www.enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html]ENB[/url] by Boris Vorontsov
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12525/?]DYNAVISION - Dynamic Depth of Field[/url] by Gopher and MyGoodEye
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3222/?]Immersive HUD - iHUD[/url] by Gopher
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12273/?]Caliente's Vanilla Outfits for CBBE[/url] by Caliente


[b][u]Tools used:[/u][/b]

- [url=http://www.creationkit.com/Main_Page]Creation Kit[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4554/?]Skyrim NPC Editor 0_75_1[/url] by foretrenty
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23972/?]Easy NPC creation tutorial[/url] by BravoOskar


You may also want to check my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57638/?]Lydia[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57583/?]Vilkas and Farkas replacer[/url].


Let me know of any issues on the comments section.

Feel free to PM me with requests for mods like this one regarding other NPC's.


And, of course, if you like it endorse it so others see it too!
[/font]
author: Elektrika
